bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to prohibit negligent storage of firearms. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Terms used in this Act mean: (1) "Firearm," as defined in subdivision 22-1-2(16); (2) "Child," a person under the age of eighteen years; (3) "Loaded firearm," as defined in subdivision 41-1-1(15). Section 2. No person may negligently store or leave a loaded firearm in a location where the person knows, or reasonably should know, that a child is likely to gain access, unless the firearm is secure against access by the child. A violation of this section is a Class 2 misdemeanor. Section 3. Section 2 of this Act does not apply to a child's access to firearms that was obtained as a result of an unlawful entry. 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
